title: Curried chicken salad on naan bread
ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts', '1L chicken stock', '225g low-fat plain yoghurt', '2 teaspoons grated lime zest', '2 teaspoons lime juice', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '4 tablespoons sliced green onions', '4 tablespoons sliced red and green pepper', '4 tablespoons sliced celery', '2 tablespoons chopped coriander, plus 4 whole sprigs', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons chopped cashews', '4 naan breads']
